<h3 id="X38031">X(38031) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(3), X(9)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(3*a^5-6*(b+c)*a^4+2*b*c*a^3+2*(b+c)*(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-3*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a-4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38031) = X(1)+2*X(31658) = X(3)+2*X(1001) = 5*X(3)-2*X(11495) = X(9)+2*X(1385) = 4*X(140)-X(2550) = X(355)-4*X(6666) = X(390)+5*X(631) = X(944)+5*X(18230) = 5*X(1001)+X(11495) = 4*X(1125)-X(5805) = 3*X(3653)-X(38030) = 3*X(5054)-X(38121) = 3*X(10165)-X(38123) = 3*X(38025)-X(38037) = 3*X(38025)-2*X(38043) = 3*X(38059)-X(38158) = 3*X(38067)-X(38126) = 3*X(38067)-2*X(38130) = 3*X(38108)-2*X(38158) = 3*X(38122)-2*X(38123)</b>
<p>X(38031) lies on these lines: {1,15837}, {2,38149}, {3,142}, {7,37737}, {9,1385}, {21,10307}, {30,38025}, {55,31231}, {140,2550}, {165,10156}, {355,6666}, {390,496}, {405,5731}, {511,38048}, {515,16857}, {517,21153}, {518,5050}, {519,38067}, {527,3653}, {528,5054}, {938,3295}, {944,18230}, {952,6883}, {954,999}, {971,3576}, {1319,15298}, {1376,38201}, {1617,17718}, {1621,6244}, {1890,3517}, {2646,15299}, {3243,15178}, {3358,31435}, {3523,35514}, {3526,3826}, {3612,14100}, {3616,5759}, {4297,31672}, {4312,5204}, {4321,5126}, {4421,24386}, {4423,7988}, {4428,10164}, {4512,11227}, {4881,10861}, {5220,37733}, {5251,30283}, {5259,8273}, {5284,7580}, {5587,11108}, {5686,7967}, {5698,31657}, {5705,9709}, {5729,30284}, {5732,13624}, {5762,28466}, {5779,15254}, {5840,38060}, {5850,11194}, {5852,16203}, {5853,26446}, {5856,38032}, {5857,38033}, {6594,12737}, {6600,16202}, {6684,30331}, {6767,28234}, {6796,16863}, {6875,8543}, {6889,9669}, {6913,28160}, {6936,9655}, {6937,7678}, {6940,7676}, {6947,31479}, {6963,7679}, {7675,37606}, {7742,37701}, {7987,11372}, {8171,13405}, {8227,18482}, {8232,18990}, {8581,37618}, {10172,11500}, {10283,22770}, {10384,30282}, {10398,13384}, {10902,16408}, {11230,38150}, {11374,12573}, {11539,38170}, {12114,16866}, {12560,37582}, {15171,37407}, {15185,31837}, {15626,16373}, {15709,38092}, {15726,28444}, {16370,21151}, {16417,38052}, {17768,28443}, {18412,34471}, {19883,38151}, {20116,31806}, {24393,37727}, {25055,38036}, {28186,38139}, {28204,38154}, {28208,38075}, {28534,38065}, {38093,38172}</p>
<p>
X(38031) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5657, 8236}, {5686, 7967}, {5731, 5817}, {11038, 21168}<br>
X(38031) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38037, 38043), (38053, 38028), (38057, 38113), (38108, 38059), (38122, 10165), (38126, 38130), (38150, 11230), (38154, 38179), (38200, 11231)<br>
X(38031) = complement of X(38149)<br>
X(38031) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (954, 7677, 999), (3616, 5759, 20330), (4423, 15931, 19541), (38025, 38037, 38043), (38067, 38126, 38130), (38131, 38132, 38113)<br>
</p>
